title: Furniture Landing Page
description: Furniture is a UI/UX project with a modern minimalist concept that showcases furniture catalogs, exclusive collections, and interior design showcases. The design is responsive, clean, and easy to use to provide a comfortable shopping experience.

title: Kokolaka Landing page
description: Kokolaka Landing Page is a simple and modern UI/UX design created to promote processed kolang kaling products. The layout is clean, fresh, and fully responsive, ensuring ease of use on both desktop and mobile devices. With a natural look and feel, the website conveys a sense of health and eco-friendliness while strengthening Kokolaka’s image as a high-quality local brand.

title: NFT Web3 Landing Page
description: NFT Web3 Landing Page is a simple and modern UI/UX design to showcase NFT collections. The website is clean, responsive, and easy to use, providing a smooth experience for users to explore the world of Web3 and NFTs.

title: Siakad
description: Siakad App – Face Detector Attendance is a UI/UX design project for an academic system that simplifies attendance using face recognition technology. With a clean and modern interface, the app makes attendance faster, more accurate, and user-friendly for both students.

title: karimunjawa App
description: Karimunjawa App is a UI/UX travel application design that helps travelers explore destination information, tour packages, and book accommodations in Karimunjawa. With a modern and user-friendly interface, the app provides a practical, informative, and enjoyable travel experience for users.

title: STI App
description: STI App is a UI/UX design for an academic application that helps students find supervisors and track their thesis or research progress. With a simple interface and clear features, this app makes it easier for students to manage guidance sessions, communicate with lecturers, and efficiently monitor their academic progress.

title: DiaCheck
description: DiaCheck is a UI/UX design for a diabetes mentoring website that helps patients monitor their condition, consult with mentors, and learn healthy lifestyle habits. With a simple and user-friendly interface, DiaCheck makes it easier for patients to manage their daily health.
